name: Datablockchain
tagline: Merging Big Data, AI And Blockchain
intro:
DataBlockChain.io is a revolutionary data platform that stands to disrupt the way that companies and individuals gather premium data. Our product will democratize data, making it more readily available and less expensive than the current methods of data gathering and vetting. The result is that clients can access specific data sets in a cost-effective and transparent way, collecting exactly what they need without paying for extraneous data. MVP is LIVE! 

We will merge our own proprietary data with many of the worldâ€™s largest databases ranging from government data, industry-specific data, voting records, business to business data, property data, credit bureau data, etc. to create a comprehensive variety of data sets valuable to individuals and businesses looking to both attract and retain clients.

As a result of our platform, all participants will be able to obtain the exact, nuanced data they are seeking. Because DataBlockChain.io removes the middlemen in the data industry.
about: While BigData has traditionally been available only to big companies, DataBlockChain.io lowers the barrier for entry and expands our potential client base to include small, medium and large businesses around the globe as well as ICOs seeking data for their new ventures. DataBlockChain.io will collaborate with a network of diverse data partners contributing billions of data points from thousands of sources.DataBlockChain.io will manage and help monetize their data helping those data partners reach a broader global audience of potential customers.  When a customer places an order on DataBlockChain.io that uses the data partners data both DataBlockChain.io and the data partner will get a percentage of the data that was purchased. The DataBlockChain.io approach will streamline and maximize profits for all parties involved. MVP is LIVE! Our main objectives are: ·         To empower Data Source Providers to provide access to their data and monetize it ·         To provide full transparency, traceability, and auditability to the data providers ·         To build confidence between the end user and data sources ·         To give Businesses and Consumers quality verified data ·         To give End Users a simplified easy-to-use interface with a quick payment system

milestones.title: Q1 2018
milestones.content:
UI Alpha, With Access To Media Direct Data.
Data Source Acquisition Phase I.

milestones.title: Q2 2018
milestones.content: MVP* Demo Release. Smart Indexing Engine Development. Data Source Acquisition Phase II.

milestones.title: Q3 2018

DBCcoin Wallet Development. 
Onboard Data Source Partners Phase I.

milestones.title: Q4 2018
milestones.content: DBCOracles And Smart Contract Integration. UI Beta.

milestones.title: Q1 2019
milestones.content: Full System Beta Test. Onboard Data Source Partners Phase II.

milestones.title: Q3 2019
milestones.content: DBCCoin Rewards Program. Airdrop Promotion to Appsbar Users.

ratings.name: VAKEESAN MAHALINGAM
ratings.title: ICO Analyst|Content Writer|Trader| CFA Charterholder|Consultant
ratings.review:
looks very promising and i'm excited to see the progress. Team looks very strong with complementary backgrounds to make this project successful. 

That being said, i don't feel you need a hard cap of $50million, it should be lower. There is no need for that much money on the top end, especially when there have been other highly successful projects created for far less. $50 million hard cap on a  capital raise with only an MVP in Q2 doesn't make any sense.

 (This is after i have attended EDCON and too much money being raised for projects was a concern that was discussed)

ratings.name: Joao Reis
ratings.title: Investor
ratings.review:
FIrst of all the vision is good but...
Team i don't see any developers there, it have a lot of 5-5-5 reviews that can be easly bought  and Advisors are not your team, packing your group with big advisors name it does not mean will be a good ICO,

My advice is add some developers to your team because they will be the key to your product, since this a tech product developers are very important to make a good review, they will transmite to investors a safety feeling that the product will be delivered.

ratings.name: Gary Chan
ratings.title: Community Manager
ratings.review: Big data and A.I had always been a hot area of technology development. For Datablockchain, there is a strong team that is able to develop it and the product will be very attractive and low cost due to the fact that it cuts out the middleman.

ratings.name: Phillip Nunn
ratings.title: Entrepreneur | CEO | ICO Advisor | Cryptocurrency Evangelist | Global Speaker | Blockchain Influencer
ratings.review:
Data is huge - The Blockchain is huge, I would be keen to hear more about this product. 

Data is one of the biggest issues that face big corporations to the point where they are scared of it and have no idea how to manage. This is where the focus for disruption should be

ratings.name: Alexander Sverdlov
ratings.title: Cyber Security Advisor for ICO startups
ratings.review: lots of big words, not that much execution. I have no idea how they got 4.9 as rating here - (except I may have a slight idea) - but this ICO has very little merit as a startup by the rules of most startups.

ratings.name: Floyd DCosta
ratings.title: Management Consultant - Blockchain Technology  | Co-founder @BlockArmour, @BlockchainWorx | Advisor, Chief Blockchain Officer @GBX
ratings.review:
A great way to leverage Blockchain technology (combined with AI) for Big Data; making it cost-effectively available to folks beyond large enterprises. 

The platform should help pull together data from various public and private silos, organize relevant data sets and democratize its availability.

Disintermediation is always welcome and will help keep costs in check while the token will provide the incentive.

A team of seasoned execs lead the project. Would love to see a prototype.

ratings.name: Eric Stone
ratings.title: 20+ year entrepreneur & tech veteren
ratings.review: The concept of doing Big Data on Blockchain, creating data marketplaces and economies is not very unique, but the utility presented in the Whitepaper could prove to be interesting.  The MVP is very light, seemingly just transaction based.  Would love to see more in terms of smart contracts or actual blockchain development beyond paying for leads using crypto.

ratings.name: Paul Mears
ratings.title: ICO investor, cryto trader and ex angel investor
ratings.review: 20m USD of tokens to team and advisors at hard cap to vest over twelve months ?  50m is a lot fo funding to spend on a roughly 12 month roadmap with 15m on dev in roughly 12 months ?  The numbers here seem excessive. Its states a lot of patents , are these being transferred to the token issuing company as curently in companies owned by founders and if not being transferred it is misleading and woudl need to see the royalty structure . Business model not clear and how revenue is split with the ICO company and any existing company, looks like foudners getting a truckload of tokens so if they are double dipping on the equity as well its not a great token model for me . A lot of uncertainties for me
